name: BLSH (Buy low, sell high)
description:
Please note that I was not able to fix the UI so if you experience any issues with it, click the little fullscreen icon in the bottom right or download standalone version for your operating system. 

BHSL (buy low, sell high) is a small game where you trade games and own all of them! You have 3 shops that you can choose from. You need to react quick, prices may change any time. The game is very unbalanced and buggy.

You can take a look at the source here or download it here.
